main: ^This robot is the manager for this area. He was built to maintain the servers and keep the virus from taking complete control over the systems.
^If you want to cross the door, you have to deal with this malicious robot.
^Plan A. You can overload the robot, its energy is not full right now if you transfer energy more than the robot can contain, the robot will be overloaded.
^Plan B. You can drain all the energy of this robot, without energy the robot will stop doing anything, however, the robot’s energy contains virus.
^After you successfully finish either plan, the door will open.
